#summary How to Contribute

We welcome contributions! To contribute, please follow these steps:

 * Determine the code you want to change. AdWhirl has several components:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/source/createClone?repo=sdk-android Android SDK]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/source/createClone?repo=sdk-iphone iPhone SDK]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/source/createClone?repo=server-website Web frontend]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/source/createClone?repo=server-mobile Backend server]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/source/createClone?repo=server-backup Backup server]
 * Create a server-side clone of the component you want to work on, by going to the [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/source/clones Source tab -> Clones] and select the repository of the component you want to work on.
 * Write your code and tests.
 * Request a code review by [http://code.google.com/p/adwhirl/issues/entry?show=review&former=sourcelist filing an Issue] . Note the name of your server-side clone so we can find it.
